content: the celtic weave earwarmer pattern uses the gorgeous celtic weave crochet stitch combo to create this beautiful and warm earwarmer what s included - a 3 page pattern pdf written in us terms - pattern includes instructions for one size with additional instruction on how to adjust to fit any size - celtic weave stitch video tutorial pattern difficulty intermediate sizing 21 x 4 5 instructions to adjust sizing included in pattern yarn 100 yards worsted #4 weight yarn - lion brand heartland 1 - 1 skein stitch tutorial ** https //youtu be/7kkm9e2mie0 2 ** all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 3 ** *listing contains affiliate links * 1 https //shrsl com/3sfq6 2 https //youtu be/7kkm9e2mie0 3 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
